Tolgee

Tolgee is a localization platform that allows you to translate your application into any language without modifying your code. It is designed to be used with web applications, but it can be used also with mobile apps and desktop applications.

Tolgee is a developer-focused platform, so it is easy to integrate with your application. No more looking for keys in your source code, no more editing localization files, and no more manual exporting data for translators.

Features Highlight:

- In-context translating:

Translating in the context is the best way to avoid mistakes translators make because of missing context. Imagine you've got just words, strings, and phrases without knowing how they relate, what order they should be in, or where are they located in the app.

- Translation memory:

Tolgee automatically makes suggestions from translations you already used in the project so you can translate similar phrases in a similar way.

Translation memory suggestions also show the similarity percentage, the key, and the original text of the translated string.

- Machine translations:

The machine translation features make the whole localization process significantly faster. Translators can just use translation suggestions provided by third-party machine translation services.

- Auto translation:

When enabled, Tolgee automatically translates new keys using translation memory or machine translation services. Your strings are translated immediately, right after creation.

CI/CD target by Elestio is a fully managed service made to handle deployment, security, reverse proxy, ssl, smtp, logs, backups & monitoring of your own source code coming from Github, Gitlab or Docker registries

Features Highlight:

- Deploy automaticaly from Github / Gitlab / Docker registries:

Go from source to production In 3 simple steps 
1) Select your source project from your account or from our samples
2) Select an existing target or create a new one (where the pipeline will be deployed)
3) Configure your pipeline (env vars, runtime, build/run command, lifecycle scripts, ...)

- Samples available for most popular frameworks:

We have created 52 sample repositories for all most popular frameworks & runtimes. Thanks to that you can quickstart with your favorite frontend / backend technology in few minutes.

- Deploy multiple containers to a single target:

You can deploy multiple instances of the same software or various software to the same CI/CD target  (eg: 3 wordpress, 2 directus, 4 mysql, 1 uptime kuma ...)

- Move pipelines between nodes:

You can move a ci/cd pipeline from one vm to another vm in a click. Your data, dns, and all settings are moving along smoothly as well to their new home. Migrate any pipeline in minutes without stress.
